artist: Artist: Pierre Alechinsky; Publisher: La Hune, Paris; Printer: Peter Bramsen
description: three separate "vignettes": rectangular area at bottom in bold black strokes; blue image at top; small design with blotches and thin lines in upper right corner; organic, biomorphic abstract designs

signed: lower right corner, in pencil: Alechinsky \'63
title: Avec plaisir
